quests.desc: It's time to explore the amazing world of TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First, it would be fantastic if you could move north. Once you get through with that, make an attempt to go east. And then, take a trip east. Following that, try to go to the south. Okay, and then, pick-up the cookie from the floor of the scullery. That's it!

infos.name: scullery
infos.desc:
You arrive in a scullery. An ordinary kind of place.

 You see a formless safe. Make a note of this, you might have to put stuff on or in it later on.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The formless safe contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The formless safe is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading south. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: steam room
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a steam room. An usual kind of place.

 You make out a cabinet.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The cabinet contains [a list of things in the c_1]. Is this what you came to TextWorld for? This... cabinet?[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The cabinet is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal a table. The table is normal.[if there is something on the s_0] On the table you can see [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
You arrive in a vault. An ordinary kind of place.



You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: cellar
infos.desc:
You are in a cellar. A typical kind of place.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: recreation zone
infos.desc:
You are in a recreation zone. An usual kind of place.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: bathroom
infos.desc:
You are in a bathroom. A normal one.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the north.

infos.name: sauna
infos.desc:
You're now in the sauna.



 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading north. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading west.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
You arrive in a study. A typical kind of place.

 You see a chair. The chair is normal.[if there is something on the s_1] On the chair you see [a list of things on the s_1]. You shudder, but continue examining the room.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading east. There is an unguarded exit to the north.

infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
You're now in the bedroom.

 Look out! It's a- oh, never mind, it's just a bar. The bar is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_2] On the bar you make out [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] But there isn't a thing on it. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: chamber
infos.desc:
You arrive in a chamber. A typical one.



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading north. There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading south.

infos.name: gateway
infos.desc: it's a well-built gateway [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: portal
infos.desc: it's a towering portal [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: passageway
infos.desc: it is what it is, a passageway [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: formless safe
infos.desc: The formless safe looks strong, and impossible to bash open. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: cabinet
infos.desc: The cabinet looks strong, and impossible to break open. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: cookie
infos.desc: You couldn't pay me to eat that normal thing.

infos.name: sandwich
infos.desc: The sandwich looks delectable.

infos.name: keyboard
infos.desc: The keyboard is well-used.

infos.name: table
infos.desc: The table is solidly built.

infos.name: chair
infos.desc: The chair is undependable.

infos.name: bar
infos.desc: The bar is stable.

infos.name: formless key
infos.desc: The formless key is cold to the touch

infos.name: plant
infos.desc: The plant would seem to be well matched to everything else here

objective: Get ready to pick stuff up and put it in places, because you've just entered TextWorld! First step, venture north. Next, make an effort to move east. Next, attempt to go east. Then, make an attempt to take a trip south. Then, retrieve the cookie from the scullery. Alright, thanks!

main_quest.desc: Get ready to pick stuff up and put it in places, because you've just entered TextWorld! First step, venture north. Next, make an effort to move east. Next, attempt to go east. Then, make an attempt to take a trip south. Then, retrieve the cookie from the scullery. Alright, thanks!
